messages.messageBody:
>
> Joyce is no good at arithmetic. She's great at math though :-)
>
> I can set problems up. Getting the numbers to work themselves out properly
> is iffy though ;-)
>
What a great way to put it. That's exactly how it is for me and why I did
well with symbolic logic and lousy at algebra. (Calculators were big and
expensive then, and we weren't allowed slide rules.)
Tia
